lead_paragraph: He is hoping to announce progress with China on the Paris climate accord and will state his case with other Asian countries on the Trans-Pacific Partnership.

headline.print_headline: Obama Heads to Asia Seeking Progress on Trade and Climate Change
headline.main: Obama Heads to Asia Seeking Breakthrough on Trade and Climate Change

snippet: He is hoping to announce progress with China on the Paris climate accord and will state his case with other Asian countries on the Trans-Pacific Partnership....
abstract: Pres Obama begins trans-Pacific trip, mostly likely his last chance as president to push for environmental conservation, halt climate change and promote trade pact Trans-Pacific Partnership; itinerary kicks off with Nevada conference on preserving Lake Tahoe, followed by stops in Hawaii, China and Laos to meet with world leaders.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change
